attributes.action: bring in compulsory life sentencing to all those found guilty of child abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: far too often lately we are seeing and hearing teerible stories of child abuse and peadophilia its about time the government stood up and said enough is enough and did something about it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
